summary:
### February 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/abi.ninja

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Updated the README to reflect recent changes and highlight new features (PR #178).
  - Added verification for OP Retro Funding round 7 (PR #177).
  - Integrated updates for wagmi, viem, and rainbowkit, including support for the monad testnet (PR #176).
  - Introduced a "Decompile" button on the network page to enhance user functionality (PR #174).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved a linking issue related to the use of himdell for function names (Issue #173).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving documentation and user experience through feature enhancements.
  - Active maintenance and updates to dependencies and network configurations.

topIssues.title: bug: if i use the himdell stuff to figure out the function names and then i link to it for someone else the link fails

topPRs.title: Add OP Retro Funding round 7 verification
Add monad testnet to networks dropdown
Add Decompile button to network page
